summary: Replaces the silverware and Sovngarde clutter textures with custom textures and environment maps. The silver jug is remapped out of necessity.
descriptionHtml:
A simple replacement of either just the silver or the silver and Sovngarde clutter with custom textures and environment maps. They have an independent texture set from my other mod, meaning that when I have time, you can expect a pack of skins for this. Nothing but the skins are changed. This covers all ingame instances of the objects at the moment, and not any object in mods that use the same mesh.
What I mean is, rather than replacing the mesh, it replaces the texture on the mesh in an .esp file.

Now replaces the \"Arentino Family Heirloom\" like it\'s supposed to.

This is a replacement edition of the silverware in this mod which also is by me: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24883

If it is necessary, I can make a version using models. I would keep the other one up.
author: The_Funktasm
